title: Understanding Math Concepts for Students with Special Educational Needs: Integrated Instructional Design with Learning Trajectories (LT) and IEPs

context.prior_knowledge: Introductory special education and mathematics pedagogy knowledge
context.additional_context: Online courses conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology environments for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain the design principles of learning trajectories (LT) for understanding math concepts among students with special educational needs.
Learners can create lesson design documents integrating learning trajectories (LT) into individualized education programs (IEP).
Learners can develop instructional strategies using ICT-based learning materials and manipulatives accessible in limited-technology environments.
Learners can design assessment tools to enhance math concept understanding for students with special educational needs.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
